item.description:
__________________________________________________________________________

Hello All,

So due to bad weather conditions we are moving the location of
the
picnic. Our member Linda Leete has offered to host this year’s
picnic.

We have changed the time of the picnic to 2pm

Here is her location:

477 Bullocks Point Ave Riverside RI, 02915

We are looking forward to seeing you then and we hope you can
still make it!!

Please call 401-919-2058 if you have any questions!

Thank You,
Laura

________________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

RI Vegan Awareness Will Serve: Vegan Burgers/ Hot Dogs, & Beverages

 (They are bringing the grill, as well. We asked .)

What to Bring: A vegan dish (no dairy or eggs please) to feed 10 people, a serving utensil, and a place setting to reduce waste!    Bring your bike if you enjoy riding, games, musical instruments to jam with others and a big appetite.       Directions from Providence:
Take Interstate Rte.195 East, to Exit 7, Rte.114 South. Follow Rte. 114 through Barrington, Warren, and into Bristol. The entrance to the park is on the right.   http://www.riparks.com/pdfs/ColtParkMap.pdf http://veganawareness.org/calendar1.aspx?id=30&d=08072011

 

Requested Donation: $5.00

Requested Donation without Potluck Dish: $10.00

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Summer Picnic with RIVA
